it: Gaining ground |    An employee gathers spent coffee grounds at Coffeebak Exchange, a coffee recycling store, at Hyundai Department Store s Sinchon branch in Mapo District, western Seoul, Tuesday. Coffee grounds, which had been classified as unrecyclable waste in the past, were recategorized as recyclable waste by the Ministry of Environment, starting from Tuesday.
